head_office_address: The Old Cart Shed Easton Lodge Farms Wansford
eu_initiatives: Agriculture, pesticides, road transport, amenity, livestock, rural, tractors, agricultural machines, harvesters.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Formed in 1893, the national Association of Agricultural Contractors (NAAC) is the representative organisation for contractors in the UK who supply all types of land-based services to farmers, government, local authorities, sports and recreational facilities.  
 
It is committed to representing the interests of its members at national and European Government level; it will offer information and advice; promote the services of its members and assist contractors in providing a professional and competitive service to farmers and the community.
